https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kpNP5tzelhWd7oT3mhSDF5c05dy.jpg On the Tibetan grasslands, Darje and Drolkar live a serene and ordinary life with their three sons and the grandfather. A condom sparks a series of embarrassment and dilemma, breaking the harmony of the family. What matters more in the circle of life and death, soul or reality? Balloon
